<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="14990,-1478 14990,-1610 15390,-1610 15390,-1478 14990,-1478"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15017" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay good so you said a lot of things there. You</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="14996" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> made some comment about the upper class. And how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15011" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about, how the upper class is selfish and how the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15027" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> upper class doesn't want to die. Right, that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15047" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> all good. How about, can you make any</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15022" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> connections to Tolstoy the author? Remember</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15015.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> from the powerpoint? How did he feel about the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15024.5" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> upper class versus the peasant class? St. 12?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="14989,-1610 14989,-1610 15391,-1610 15391,-1610 14989,-1610"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="14989,-1477.5 14989,-1638.5 15391,-1638.5 15391,-1477.5 14989,-1477.5"/>

<!-- 58 -->

<text text-anchor="start" x="16995" y="-1604.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 58 - STUDENT 12</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17065.5" y="-1589.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="16902,-1493 16902,-1580 17268,-1580 17268,-1493 16902,-1493"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16916.5" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> He found that the uh upper class couldn't find</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16934.5" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the true meaning of life and that even for</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16928" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> himself, he said he didn't find a meaningful</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16908" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> life until he was a peasant and he could work for</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17042.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> something.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16526" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Pure' is a good word, yea. Morally superior,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16538.5" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they lived a morally superior lifestyle in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16508" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> comparison to those of the upper class. So, here</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16513" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> we are in chapter one, already seeing Tolstoy's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16523" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> attiude about the Russian upper class of the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16515" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> 1800's, about how he feels about them. About,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16523.5" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> bless you, how they're selfish, how they feel</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16511.5" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about death, how they treat one another, right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16529" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that's pretty significant and I think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16522.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> through all of this, his end goal, as we'll talk</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16516.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about as we continue to, to read, is what St. 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16515.5" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> said, through all of this, his goal is to teach us</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16593" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that big theme which is?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16501,-1648 16501,-1648 16867,-1648 16867,-1648 16501,-1648"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16501,-1440 16501,-1676 16867,-1676 16867,-1440 16501,-1440"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="15868" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Mmhmm. What did he say about the people of the</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="18180" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I love, I love your question! I love this part.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18164" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What do you guys think about that? What, what</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="17749" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> When he walks into the room of, of Ivan Ilyich and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17749.5" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> why is it hard for him to decide whether to bow or</text>

<!-- 63 -->
<g id="node114" class="node">
<title>63</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="17328,-1693 17328,-1720 17706,-1720 17706,-1693 17328,-1693"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17438.5" y="-1702.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 63 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="17328,-1396 17328,-1693 17706,-1693 17706,-1396 17328,-1396"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17343.5" y="-1675.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What? {"How to live.", St. 12} How to live very</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17337.5" y="-1660.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> good. How to live. Let's get some more questions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17334" y="-1645.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> from you guys. And when we have our discussions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17364" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> guys, I want you to think, think a little bit</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17348.5" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> deeper than just the comprehension. I already</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17372.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> assume that you've read it and that you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17364.5" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> understand the book let's talk about, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17353" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> some of those bigger philosophical questions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17344.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about life and death and how to live and how to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17374" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> treat death. Let's try to think that way,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17344" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because this is our opportunity to examine how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17334.5" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> we live our lives and how we look at death. This is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17351" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> our opportunity, we're looking at death subje-</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17401.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I'm sorry, objectively instead of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17391" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> objectively. We're looking at death</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17363.5" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> objectively without any emotion attached,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17360.5" y="-1435.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> this is our chance to examine our lives and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17345.5" y="-1420.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> potentially our own deaths someday long, long,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17407.5" y="-1405.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> long, in the far future. St. 19?</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19205.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Um, like, when he, like, ... like, approached</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19198" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> his coffin, I think that's what it was, um, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19192" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he didn't really know what to do, because, like,</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19219" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they're all talking about, like, how, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19214" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they didn't really like him so, like, in this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19200.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> manner, he did die, and, like, so he thinks he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19214.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> should respect him but, like, he still has,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19265" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like, so much hate for him.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21031" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yes, very good, and how many of you people have</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21846" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Grief, big time grief. So much grief that you're</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21850" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "He didn't bow," or "He didn't cross himself."</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21838.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Are these thoughts crossing your mind? So, how</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21858.5" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pictured Peter Ivanovich walking up to the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21856.5" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> coffin? If you didn't, that's okay. But now in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21854.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> reflection you can, you should, because he's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21878" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> satirizing Peter Ivanovich. What's his</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21863" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relationship with Ivan Ilych? What's their</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21966" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relationship?</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="23875" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Perfect, and what other people think about him.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23894.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> So, author's purpose? What is the author's</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="25572" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Like how much people truly care about you even</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="28600" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Careful, I don't know about 'backstab.' I don't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28615" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> think there's animosity here, it's just how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28594" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they behave, he just presents them as they are.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="30755.5" y="-1717.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 101 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="30647,-1381 30647,-1708 31030,-1708 31030,-1381 30647,-1381"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30686.5" y="-1690.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yes, fake. {some laughter from class} So,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30680" y="-1675.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> everybody, like, I know it sounds funny, but</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30679" y="-1660.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> ingrain that word into your memory for this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30679" y="-1645.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> book, because that's what these people are.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30682" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> These people are fake. They only do things</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30673" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because society says that they should. Okay?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30671.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> They only do things because society says that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30659" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they should. Why did Ivan Ilych get married? Did</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30668" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he love her? Did we read that chapter yet? Oh,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30669.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it's not two yet? Anybody read ahead? No? So,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30680.5" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you'll find, when you read the next chapter,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30659" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that he didn't marry her because he loved her, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30689.5" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> married her because society said that he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30687.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> should. And Peter Ivanovich isn't worried</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30680" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about the sadness he's feeling because he's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30680.5" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> lost his best friend, he's only worried about</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30653" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what society says that he should do when he walks</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30690.5" y="-1435.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> up to the coffin. So, think about author's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30664" y="-1420.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> purpose and what Tolstoy's trying to prove with</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30671" y="-1405.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> this kind of behavior. St. 19, does that answer</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30783" y="-1390.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> your question?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="30646,-1708 30646,-1708 31031,-1708 31031,-1708 30646,-1708"/>

</g>

<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="43533,-1411 43533,-1678 43906,-1678 43906,-1411 43533,-1411"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43548" y="-1660.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> And I think what's really important here is just</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43540.5" y="-1645.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> keep in mind what these people do is, everything</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="43539" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> some way, to improve their own situation in some</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43550.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> way but not for others. So, it's probably not as</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="43549.5" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> probably that he wants to help out himself and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43564.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> makes his life a little bit better. So, I think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43552" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that's important to note. Okay, what else? Try</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43547" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> not to give me questions about comprehension.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43560" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> If you had a question about comprehension,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43551" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> let's not use that one, let's use a question that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43554.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> has a little bit more to do with theme or, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43577" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that, those philosophical, philosophical</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43554.5" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questions, sorry, that have to do with life and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43540.5" y="-1435.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> death. What else did you have there? Thanks, St.</text>

<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="47733,-1580 47733,-1622 48097,-1622 48097,-1580 47733,-1580"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="47755" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Um it says uh, "He screamed for three days</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="46747.5" y="-1664.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 153 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="46644,-1433 46644,-1655 47017,-1655 47017,-1433 46644,-1433"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46665" y="-1637.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay, so, pretty painful. Yea, alright now, you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46669" y="-1622.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> guys can think of the worst pain you've ever</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46660.5" y="-1607.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> imagined, which I'm thinking, breaking a bone</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46664.5" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> might be that, I'm not sure, um but this guy's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46650.5" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> probably in so much pain and I think maybe it's a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46653" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> combination of pain and denial at the same time,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46654.5" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it's so much pain that he screams for three days</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46671" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> straight. So, take your worst pain and think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46650" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about how miserable he must have been. Can you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46656.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> picture that? Pretty awfu? And now, what is the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46659" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> satire that Tolstoy uses there? Go to that page,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46653" y="-1472.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> see if you can figure out what the satire is. What</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46668.5" y="-1457.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> is satire by the way? You all defined it at the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46779" y="-1442.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> start of class.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="46098" y="-1612.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 151 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="45992,-1486 45992,-1603 46370,-1603 46370,-1486 45992,-1486"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46013" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay, so ,I think that's a really important part</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46023.5" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of the text. Um he screamed for three days</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="45998.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> straight. Now, how many people have ever broken</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46016" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> a bone here? Okay, did you scream? Anybody</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46019.5" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> scream? I've never broken a bone so, I don't</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="48784" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Um so, this is the wife talking and she's saying</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="48791" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to put through him screaming and in pain for</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="48844.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> being sad and not him in pain.</text>

<!-- 163 -->
<g id="node216" class="node">
<title>163</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="50180,-1640 50180,-1667 50556,-1667 50556,-1640 50180,-1640"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50285" y="-1649.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 163 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="50180,-1448 50180,-1640 50556,-1640 50556,-1448 50180,-1448"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50189.5" y="-1622.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> The wife right? The widow! Sorry, um yes, this is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50204" y="-1607.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the widow, right? She should be like, "Oh my</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50196.5" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> gosh! My poor husband!" But instead she says,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50186" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "Oh it was awful, I don't know how I bore through</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50187" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it all! It was so hard on me! It was unbearable for</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50204" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> me to stand the pain he was facing!" Are you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50187.5" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> kidding! So, how many people laughed when they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50199" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> read that part? You should've laughed, and it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50207" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> okay now that you know, if you didn't, that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50189" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> okay, but now that you know, you should laugh at</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50210.5" y="-1472.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> these people when they say things like this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50213" y="-1457.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> okay? Because why? Why is it funny? Yea?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="50179,-1640 50179,-1640 50557,-1640 50557,-1640 50179,-1640"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="50179,-1447.5 50179,-1668.5 50557,-1668.5 50557,-1447.5 50179,-1447.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="52143" y="-1597.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 166 - STUDENT 4</text>

<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="52059,-1501 52059,-1573 52407,-1573 52407,-1501 52059,-1501"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52065" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> She's acting almost like it's a person that she,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52087" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like, almost hated. She didn't like them.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52070" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> {laughter from Teacher} {"That's true too.",</text>

<!-- 171 -->
<g id="node220" class="node">
<title>171</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="51642,-1670 51642,-1697 52023,-1697 52023,-1670 51642,-1670"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51749.5" y="-1679.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 171 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="51642,-1418 51642,-1670 52023,-1670 52023,-1418 51642,-1418"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51681.5" y="-1652.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yea. Do you sort of look at this and say to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51661.5" y="-1637.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yourself, "Wow, these people are clueless. Why</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51676" y="-1622.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> are they so, so silly, so oblivious?" Are you,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51665.5" y="-1607.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> are you kinda looking at them, like, "Duh, you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51648" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> should know better than to behave that way." How</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51665.5" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> many people are thinking that in their minds?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51717" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Like, she's definitely not acting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51664" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> appropriately. Okay, and I think Tolstoy wants</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51675.5" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> those things, that you kind of giggle at like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51662.5" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that, I think he wants those things to stick out</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51659.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like a sore thumb to you. This is your chance to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51672" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> stop and examine your life and ask yourself,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51656.5" y="-1472.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "Would I ever do anything like that? I'm not this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51678.5" y="-1457.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> selfish, am I?" And I think that's really his</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51660" y="-1442.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> goal. When you see them do things like this, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51655" y="-1427.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wants you to stop and look at your own life. Yea?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="51641,-1670 51641,-1670 52024,-1670 52024,-1670 51641,-1670"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="51640.5,-1417.5 51640.5,-1698.5 52023.5,-1698.5 52023.5,-1417.5 51640.5,-1417.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="53369.5" y="-1612.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 172 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53444.5" y="-1597.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="53276,-1486 53276,-1588 53652,-1588 53652,-1486 53276,-1486"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53282" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Uh I found another example, when the widow was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53294" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> being selfish. When she was just talking to um</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53295.5" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Peter about the money that she could possibly</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53285" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> get, from the government, she wanted more than</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53285" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what she was given. And she actually cried when</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53307.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> she figured out that she couldn't get more.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="53275,-1588 53275,-1588 53653,-1588 53653,-1588 53275,-1588"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="53275,-1485 53275,-1631 53653,-1631 53653,-1485 53275,-1485"/>
</g>

<!-- 175 -->
<g id="node224" class="node">
<title>175</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="52882,-1610 52882,-1637 53240,-1637 53240,-1610 52882,-1610"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52978" y="-1619.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 175 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="52882,-1478 52882,-1610 53240,-1610 53240,-1478 52882,-1478"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52901.5" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Absolutely. Absolutely! You kinda can't help</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52889.5" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> but laugh at these people, right? Tolstoy wants</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52903" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you to stop and ask yourself, "Do I have my</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52929" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> priorities in line? Am I living my life</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52912" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> correctly? I don't behave like this, do I?"</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52888" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Cause this obviously is not the right way to live</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52896" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> according to Tolstoy, and I think we probably</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52997.5" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> know that. St. 8?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="52881,-1610 52881,-1610 53241,-1610 53241,-1610 52881,-1610"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="52881,-1477.5 52881,-1638.5 53241,-1638.5 53241,-1477.5 52881,-1477.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 173 -->
<g id="node225" class="node">
<title>173</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="52467,-1595 52467,-1622 52846,-1622 52846,-1595 52467,-1595"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52573.5" y="-1604.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 173 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="52467,-1493 52467,-1595 52846,-1595 52846,-1493 52467,-1493"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52490" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> {laughter from Teacher} Yeah, I mean, when,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52489.5" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> when she's crying about her husband's death,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52503.5" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> she is easily able to control herself, right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52475.5" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> But then, later on when we find that she can't get</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52497.5" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> anymore money, that she's really sad right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52473" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What else is funny about that situation? Mmhmm?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="52466,-1595 52466,-1595 52847,-1595 52847,-1595 52466,-1595"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="52465.5,-1492.5 52465.5,-1623.5 52846.5,-1623.5 52846.5,-1492.5 52465.5,-1492.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="56486" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that another example would be that, on</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56484" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> page 36, it says, "There is, in fact, no reason to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56474" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> assume this incident can keep us from spending a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56587" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pleasant evening."</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="56467,-1573 56467,-1573 56845,-1573 56845,-1573 56467,-1573"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="56467,-1500 56467,-1616 56845,-1616 56845,-1500 56467,-1500"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="56528" y="-1208.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> So, just basically, people are um not thinking</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="56550.5" y="-1163.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> should feel more happy that he's gone.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="55720" y="-1223.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Is this the time and place to be asking about</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="54883" y="-1268.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yea, let's go out and play cards. Let's go out and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54884.5" y="-1253.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> play cards, right? "Let's hurry up and get out of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54890.5" y="-1238.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> here so we can play cards." Meanwhile, this is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54899" y="-1223.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> supposed to be their friend, their colleague,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54879" y="-1208.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> right? Let's go back to the idea of the widow. The</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54899.5" y="-1193.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> widow is talking to Peter Ivanovich. "Hey is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54866" y="-1178.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> there any way where I can get some more money out</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54884.5" y="-1163.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of the government from this? Like, now that my</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54890" y="-1148.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> husband's dead, can I get some more money?"</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54900.5" y="-1133.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Right? So, that part is funny but what else?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="54933" y="-1118.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Where are they right now? St. 17?</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="57974" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Um so going back to the game of bridge uh so, it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57983" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> says that Peter sat through the service and he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57985" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was one of the first people to leave to then go</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57993" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> play with Schwartz, uh playing bridges. So,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57982.5" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> obviously this is one of the hyporitical uh cues</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57976" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of how the author portrays uh um, like, Peter ad</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57996.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> his other close friends. So, my question is,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57968" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "How would you prove your friendship to someone</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58097.5" y="-1472.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> if they [died]."</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="57961,-1610 57961,-1610 58342,-1610 58342,-1610 57961,-1610"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="57960.5,-1462.5 57960.5,-1653.5 58341.5,-1653.5 58341.5,-1462.5 57960.5,-1462.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="57442" y="-1672.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 189 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="57338,-1426 57338,-1663 57712,-1663 57712,-1426 57338,-1426"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57356.5" y="-1645.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay. .. I think that we just expect a whole lot</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57344.5" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> more grief and how about kindness for the widow</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57353.5" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> or for the children? Like, "I'm so sorry for your</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57365.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> loss." Those sorts of comments. I think that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57347" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> might be more of what we'd expect in a situation</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57352.5" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like this but we really don't see that from thsse</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57355.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> characters. And in chapter one, Tolstoy does a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57357.5" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> really good job of character development, and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57357.5" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you start to learn about these characters, and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57344" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what kind of people they are. And that's gonna be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57360.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> important to our understanding of the rest of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57369" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the text. Alright, let's do another question.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57368" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Or if it's not on your list and it's something</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57378" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that is, like, a burning question, for you,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57441.5" y="-1435.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> let's do it. Okay, St. 2?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="57337,-1663 57337,-1663 57713,-1663 57713,-1663 57337,-1663"/>
